title: Cotton Seed Cake
process: At our company, we employ a meticulous process for the production of cotton seed cake, a valuable by-product of cottonseed oil extraction. We start with the careful selection of premium cottonseeds, which undergo thorough cleaning to remove impurities. Following oil extraction, the remaining seed residue is processed into cotton seed cake through compression or pelletization.
quality: Our cotton seed cake is then subjected to rigorous quality control measures to ensure consistency and purity. We conduct extensive testing to verify nutritional content, protein levels, and absence of contaminants. Our commitment to quality ensures that our cotton seed cake serves as a reliable and nutritious ingredient for animal feed and agricultural applications, meeting the stringent requirements of our customers and industry standards.
